CURL
https://curl.haxx.se/download.html

SDL
https://libsdl.org/download-2.0.php
Root CMakeLists.txt - update minimal required CMake version to cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15) (to enable -DCMAKE_MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY flag)

Corrade, Magnum
https://github.com/mosra/corrade/releases
https://github.com/mosra/corrade/releases
Root CMakeLists.txt - update minimal required CMake version to cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15) (to enable -DCMAKE_MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY flag)
